bibl.title: From Aswan to Dongola: The Epitaph of Bishop Joseph (died AD 668).
bibl.note: D 1/04 [Greek and Coptic epitaph] was discovered in Old Dongola in 2004. - The find and its context. - The text. - Commentary. - Historical and religious context.

bibl.title: Nubian Voices. Studies in Christian Nubian Culture

bibl.seg: Stefan Jakobielski & Jacques van der Vliet, From Aswan to Dongola: The Epitaph of Bishop Joseph (died AD 668).

Adam Łajtar & Jacques van der Vliet (edd.), with the assistance of Grzegorz Ochała & Giovanni Ruffini, Nubian Voices. Studies in Christian Nubian Culture = The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume XV (Warsaw, 2011) pp. 15-35, 4 figg.
D 1/04 [Greek and Coptic epitaph] was discovered in Old Dongola in 2004. - The find and its context. - The text. - Commentary. - Historical and religious context.
